'''Starwicker''' is a [[Technique Card|Technique]] [[Equipment Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created through [[Stars Gather at Dusk (Character Card Skill)|Stars Gather at Dusk]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.
